title: {greenBright The City Park}
description: For a moment, you can almost forget the {gray dinginess} of {yellow Beachhedge} as you walk among the {redBright f}{yellowBright l}{greenBright o}{redBright w}{yellowBright e}{greenBright r}{redBright s}. The park is ringed by {green tall trees}, blocking any view of the decrepit city and giving the park a feeling of {cyan tranquility}.
